Articles.Content:
So when I was playing the game, I decided to play a scenario where Jebediah Kerman was 40 metres away from the ship. After landing the ship I went onto one of my saves and then decided to send an aircraft to fly to the KSC2 area (since I wanted to land there after placing a flag to mark the area). When I entered the Spaceplane hanger, this suddenly happened.

![Capture.JPG](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-5smw_Z8L9IA/VWXbGzoGW1I/AAAAAAAAAVY/fO5XYea77Ac/w981-h553-no/Capture.JPG)

I was frankly surprised at what happened to the building. Then I decided to build a random craft and move inside of the building.

![Capture2.JPG](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-TC9COk0qIXk/VWXbHyhQObI/AAAAAAAAAVY/rcY2vIC6Q2A/w982-h551-no/Capture2.JPG)

It appears the VAB has merged with the SPH. So instead I decided to load a Z-map sattelite launch kit (unmodified). I pressed launch and the Planet Kerbin seems in a mess.

![Capture3.JPG](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-r8bjzz8Ym2I/VWXbKQ8AaAI/AAAAAAAAAVY/vNhAt2j1cQM/w982-h555-no/Capture3.JPG)

Next to the runway you see (not only the Galaxy background) a booster firing sideways. I can't do anything (interact with the buttons) until I press M.

![Capture4.JPG](https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-pJDkfvmfeI0/VWXbPFL7jgI/AAAAAAAAAVY/38XUkpmtgCI/w982-h552-no/Capture4.JPG)

The game focuses on the Sun (Kerbol) for some reason. I decided to click on Kerbin and I find no evidence of my loaded craft ever existing. So I go out of map view and find the Planet slowly leaving me.

![Capture5.JPG](https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-0VTUgWzWU-0/VWXbQO7U5xI/AAAAAAAAAVY/d_QYduouIF4/w982-h553-no/Capture5.JPG)

The map mode's Statistics merge with the non-map mode. And you can see a booster in the background firing its engines.

Mods used: Hyper Edit, Kerbal engineering Redux.

Version: 1.0.2.842

So what is going on hear? Is there a Kraken that I haven't read about?

Maybe you have been playing at god just one too many times with that Hyper Edit and the universe just couldn't take any more ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Maybe you have been playing at god just one too many times with that Hyper Edit and the universe just couldn't take any more ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

LOL That made my day! But I've only started installing hyperedit onto the game, haven't used it (except for that one time where I put an E class asteroid from hitting Kerbin). It's quite a weird, game crashing bug.

I think to say this new bug could be called "Titan Kraken" But It could be simply fixed by just reloading the game. Also, as a pre-caution; any ship that you launch when this happens will dissapear. So unless the game auto-saves the craft that you've made, the game will register the craft as 'Wait, was this here before?'
